title: Sathorn Vista, Bangkok - Marriott Executive Apartments
description: At Sathorn Vista, Bangkok - Marriott Executive Apartments, you will enjoy the convenience of full-service Bangkok 5-star hotel facilities with the space, ambiance and privacy of residential living. Unique among 5-star hotels in Bangkok, our completely furnished apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen, housekeeping services, storage facilities, appliances, including washers and dryers, ovens and coffee makers, and 24-hour staffing, making our lodging appropriate for any length of stay. Enjoy Thai and international cuisine at our all-day-dining restaurant, MoMo Caf√©, or unwind in our outdoor saltwater pool. Premier among Bangkok 5-star hotels, we offer meeting space options for intimate events. Located in the heart of the vibrant central business district, our 5-star hotel in Bangkok is conveniently accessible and near businesses, embassies, hospitals, recreation, shopping and entertainment facilities. Sala Daeng BTS Skytrain and Lumpini MRT Subway station are both within a 10-minute walk.

review.name: Abu Hurain
review.review: Used to stay here everytime i come to bangkok. Due to covid, didnt come for two years. A bit aged. Room size is good for family travel, it feel likes home. Recommended.

review.name: Shuvo Khan
review.review: This was the most professional and friendly staff that I had the pleasure of doing business with. The cleaniness speaks for itself. The restaurant was well stocked and the food was served hot and fresh. The cooks & wait staff was also professional and checked the food bars often to ensure everything was available for the patrons. Great job Sathorn Vista, Bangkok- Marriott Executive Apartments.

review.name: Arman Salek
review.review: Booked a 2 bedroom room which is good size, great for families. Location a little far from BTS so you‚Äôll need to grab or taxi around

title: Millennium Hilton Bangkok (SHA Plus)
description: Millennium Bangkok is a riverfront sanctuary in proximity to the heart of the city and cultural district with a spectacular view of the Chao Phraya River from every guest room and suite. The hotel offers a fresh perspective of life and is close to a vibrant network of streets filled with art galleries, museums, and authentic markets. Conveniently located within a short walking distance from the BTS Gold Line Charoen Nakhon station the property can be easily reached via a cross-river ferry from the Si Phaya Pier next to the River City Bangkok shopping center. ICONSIAM, one of the largest shopping malls in Asia, is just a few minutes‚Äô walk from the hotel. Enjoy a scenic ride along the Chao Phraya River with our complimentary shuttle boat from the hotel's private pier to Saphan Taksin BTS Skytrain station daily from 6 am to 9.45 pm. This 32-storey landmark by the bank of the Chao Phraya River features 533 guest rooms, which are elegantly appointed with upscale amenities, oversized bathrooms, and panoramic river views. The riverside all-day-dining restaurant, Flow provides a wide variety of international menu selections. While ThreeSixty Jazz Lounge and ThreeSixty Rooftop Bar remain, the hotel highlight for a perfect evening.

review.name: Abu Hurain
review.review: Last minute booking because our flight was delayed and current hotel we were staying was fully booked. Decided to book this hotel as we wanted to stay close to Iconsiam shopping mall, the review of the hotel was pretty good and the price was reasonable. The room size is average, bed is comfortable, nice view to Chao Phraya river from the room and restaurant, good quality soap and toiletries by Crabtree & Evelyn, and buffet breakfast had good selection of food. We found that the room felt a bit dated and not as luxury as other 5 star hotels, no handspray for the toilet and we didn't get welcome drink. For the same price I would prefer a different hotel.

review.name: Shuvo Khan
review.review: Service was awesome, food was amazing! Loving the cocktails too! Book an executive room to get access to executive lounge at level 31, where we can enjoy their afternoon tea, evening cocktail & American Breakfast with a great view. Staffs were very friendly too!

review.name: Arman Salek
review.review: It‚Äôs a nice hotel. The location is good. The staff are very friendly. The room is clean. It is really good to stay if you plan to have staycation.

title: The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore
description: With an iconic location in Marina Bay, immerse in a canvas of views at The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore. This luxurious hotel is 20 minutes away from Changi International Airport, and is strategically located for guests to experience the vibrant energy of Marina Bay. The Singapore Flyer, Merlion, ArtScience Museum, Gardens by the Bay and many other attractions are a short walk from our hotel. The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore offers gorgeously appointed rooms and suites, a 4,200-piece museum quality art collection and an elevated Club Lounge experience on level 32 with panoramic views of the city. Savour award-winning dining at Colony and the one Michelin star Summer Pavilion, or enjoy delicious cocktails, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner at Republic. While you are here, embrace tranquility at The Ritz-Carlton Spa, the first La Mer hotel partner spa in Asia Pacific. Surrounded by lush greenery, the hotel's outdoor swimming pool is a sanctuary for guests to unwind and relax.

review.name: Abu Hurain
review.review: Stayed over the long weekends, the queue to check in and check out were pretty long. However, all the staffs were very kind and attentive. Overall an enjoyable stay and 5 star for the service/hospitality provided.

review.name: Shuvo Khan
review.review: Always a pleasure to stay here at Ritz. Huge rooms, excellent warm service and gorgeous hotel spaces. Incredible experience!

review.name: Arman Salek aru
review.review: Great location with stunning views. The service was really awesome. Thumb up üëçüèª

title: The Prince Gallery Tokyo Kioicho, a Luxury Hotel
description: Situated a minutes‚Äô walk away from Akasaka-Mitsuke Station of the Tokyo Metro Ginza and Marunouchi Line, The Prince Gallery Tokyo Kioicho boasts free WiFi throughout the entire property. There is a sake bar, a sushi restaurant and a teppanyaki restaurant on site, as well as a fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk.

review.name: Abu Hurain
review.review: The hotel was very nice. However, to use the swimming pool, I was given a locker key to change into a swimsuit, but there was a charge(room charge.) I was embarrassed because there was no explanation in advance that a fee would be charged. I hope to be informed enough in the future.

review.name: Shuvo Uddin
review.review: I went for 999 yen at the Yumetabi Festival, but I had a lot of fun! ! ! The room and night view were beautiful! I was relieved that the security was solid before getting on the elevator and from the room floor! The pool was nice and clean with few people.

review.name: Arman Salek
review.review: The location is super good, in a bustling and lively place. Super convenient, there are supermarkets, various restaurants, restaurants on the 36th floor, you can see Tokyo Tower and Sky Tree. I want to stay next time.

title: Ramada by Manila Central
description: As the newest and only luxury hotel in the world‚Äôs oldest Chinatown, Ramada Manila Central brings you a step closer to the gastronomical adventures and cultural wonders that Binondo has to offer. Located just 11 kilometers away from Ninoy Aquino International Airport, you have an easy access to Manila‚Äôs historic spots: the walled district of Intramuros, the Fort Santiago, and the Rizal Park are all within a 4-km distance. And just next door is one of Manila‚Äôs oldest and most beautiful churches - Minor Basilica of St. Lorenzo Ruiz, or more commonly known as Binondo Church. For the shopaholic in you, a ten-minute walk from the hotel will bring you to Divisoria, the most popular bargain haven in the city, and a twenty-minute shuttle ride will bring you to SMX Convention Center and Mall of Asia, one of the biggest malls in the world.
